title: Time on your hands
creator_contributor_role: Churches Television and Radio Centre, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Aging
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Retirement
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Aged - Psychology
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Autonomy (Psychology) in old age
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Aged - Health and hygiene
description: Looks at the problem of retirement through the eyes of a general practitioner who is concerned for the future of elderly people and who believes that health is a matter of attitude. Shows how people have made themselves new interests and new friends during their increased leisure time.
